column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We've ordered the tuna special: raw tuna
column2: which was very delicate and fresh. The lamb special with a warm puree underneath was perfectly cooked and tasted amazing. We've also ordered the shishito peppers
column3: which are really hard to find
column4: but they were chargrilled to perfection and served with a little salt on top: so good. The dates wrapped in bacon are a classic
column5: and it did taste just like I remember it from Spain. While we were pretty full after that we still decided to order desserts
column6: and they were just the perfect size: the flan was the right texture and tasted really good
column7: but my favorite was the cheesecake
column8: which reminded me of the way my mom would make it
column10: instead of cream cheese. It was soo good I wish I had a whole pie of this cheesecake.
